body.title: DOM4J The Flexible XML Framework for Java

header.p: DOM4J is an open and easy to use, interface-based Java API for navigating and manipulating XML documents.
DOM4J combines the best of DOM, SAX, XPath and the Java 2 platform to provide a flexible and powerful framework integrating XML and Java.
DOM4J extends the Java 2 Collections framework to handle XML documents allowing flexible plug and play implementations and has fully integrated XPath navigation support from anywhere in the model.
